original: Protistology is the scientific study of protists, a diverse group of eukaryotic microorganisms. The term was popularized by Ernst Haeckel, although the field has gained widespread recognition more recently. Researchers in this discipline often identify themselves with various related fields, including protozoology, phycology, mycology, microbiology, microscopy, parasitology, limnology, biology, natural history, zoology, and botany. Desp

The term was popularized by Ernst Haeckel, although the field has gained widespread recognition more lately. Researchers in this discipline often identify themselves with various related fields, including protozoology, phycology, mycology, microbiology, microscopy, parasitology, limnology, biology, natural evolution, zoology, and botany.
